nodes.text: Lorrdians were a sentient bipedal species that gave off a distinctive natural scent and had a very expressive body language. Lorrdian members of the Brotherhood of the Beatific Countenance wore concealing robes that acted as a physical vow of silence.
Rabé, a handmaiden of Queen Padmé Amidala, was considered an expert in reading body language thanks to training from Lorrdians.
